p: A total of 276 (39.6%) patients required ICU admission and 95 (13.6%) died. In the multivariable analysis, age ≥75 years was associated with lower ICU admission (aOR 0.36, 95% CI: 0.22–0.59). The 65–74 years age group was not associated with ICU admission, but the statistical power was low (43%). Immune deficiency was also associated with ICU admission ( Fig 1 and S1 Table).
